body:
# The AFAD Dataset

Authors: To Be Updated

-----------------------------------------

![lite](/lite.png)  

## 0. Abstract

The Asian Face Age Dataset (AFAD) is a new dataset proposed for evaluating the 
performance of age estimation, which is collected from the RenRen Social Network.
According to the birth data that RenRen Social Network requires users to provide,
labels can be generated.
  
Compared with other aging databases, e.g. FG-NET which contains about `1k` images,
MORPH ALBUM II, which contains about `55k` images, the AFAD has `160k` images.
Additionally, there is few ASIAN FACE in the MORPH and FG-NET dataset, thus the 
AFAD is noticeable in terms of ethic.

## 1. Publications

1. Unpublished

## 2. Dataset

Please notice that this dataset is made available for academic research purpose only.
  
#### 2.1 Dataset: AFAD-LITE

AFAD-LITE is a subset of the complete AFAD dataset, which contains images of 22
continuous ages, in the amount of 60K.
  
The resource is under preparation..  

#### 2.2 Dataset: AFAD
  
AFAD is the complete version of AFAD dataset.
  
The resource is under preparation.  

## 3. Experimental Results

Results are being updated.

```
Method          |      MAE (MORPH II)      |       MAE (AFAD)          
--------------------------------------------------------------------      
Baseline CNN    |        3.62736        |       placeholder              
```
